name: Ballast (Ekoxe, wesslo)
description:
Another peaceful day at sea. Your trustworthy submarine will take you deep into the ocean. ... That said, there used to be a full crew working here, but now it's just you. Things can get chaotic quite quickly around here.  Manual:
  • If our submarine crashes we will take in water
  • If the wheel is at max we will take in water
  • Watch the TV if you want to
  • If the pressure is at max the containers and the wheel will accelerate
  • If one of the containers is full, the submarine will speed up
Good Luck!
